data.name: nvim_win_close
data.description: Closes the window (like |:close| with a |window-ID|).

data.name: nvim_win_del_var
data.description: Removes a window-scoped (w:) variable

data.name: nvim_win_get_buf
data.description: Gets the current buffer in a window

data.name: nvim_win_get_config
data.description: Gets window configuration.

data.name: nvim_win_get_cursor
data.description:
Gets the (1,0)-indexed cursor position in the window.
                |api-indexing|

data.name: nvim_win_get_height
data.description: Gets the window height

data.name: nvim_win_get_number
data.description: Gets the window number

data.name: nvim_win_get_option
data.description: Gets a window option value

data.name: nvim_win_get_position
data.description:
Gets the window position in display cells. First position is
                zero.

data.name: nvim_win_get_tabpage
data.description: Gets the window tabpage

data.name: nvim_win_get_var
data.description: Gets a window-scoped (w:) variable

data.name: nvim_win_get_width
data.description: Gets the window width

data.name: nvim_win_is_valid
data.description: Checks if a window is valid

data.name: nvim_win_set_buf
data.description: Sets the current buffer in a window, without side-effects

data.name: nvim_win_set_config
data.description:
Configures window layout. Currently only for floating and
                external windows (including changing a split window to those
                layouts).

data.name: nvim_win_set_cursor
data.description:
Sets the (1,0)-indexed cursor position in the window.
                |api-indexing|

data.name: nvim_win_set_height
data.description:
Sets the window height. This will only succeed if the screen
                is split horizontally.

data.name: nvim_win_set_option
data.description:
Sets a window option value. Passing 'nil' as value deletes the
                option(only works if there's a global fallback)

data.name: nvim_win_set_var
data.description: Sets a window-scoped (w:) variable

data.name: nvim_win_set_width
data.description:
Sets the window width. This will only succeed if the screen is
                split vertically.
